title: when i click- i lag
body:
quit simple. 
if lets say i click to walk to the other nexus on the minimap, everything is ok, the char will walk there no lags.
when i click on the ground and change directions (like ur doing 24/7) i lag. (the more commands- more lags)
its on my new computer, which is made for gaming, i7 gtx1060 and such, so no bad hardware... idk whats going on.
its not a delay, its more of a visual stop and proceed.
plz help.

replies.body:
Alternatively make a custom game and edit your setting as follows.
1. Once in game click Escape
2. Options
3. Game
4. Look under the gameplay tab
5. Make sure movement predication is off

This used to create what looked like lag everytime I clicked or moved anywhere although I had on lag. Hope it helps!

It sounds like you're having input delay, which happens when there's a network issue failing to maintain a steady connection to the game server.  TO know for sure, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on in game.  I'm guessing you'll find some packet loss.  Fortunately, the results will also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Let me know if you have any questions!

well i checked the log reader and everything was smooth.
i did the movement prediction thing, helped but not totally, now it only happens when i turn and only for the first few minutes. still anoyying as hell. but helped a ton, thanks love
i  really wonder whats the source of it. i mean something that only lasts for a few minutes? only on turns? lol wtf
